item.description: Agenda Background Center list Example This is normal image img-100 class to set max width to 100% img-75 class to set max width to 75% Also available on … overflow can make the image overflow Blockquote Syntax Two Column Syntax for two column Footnote class: center middle bg-primary text-light RemarkJS - CSS Guide Hugo Theme | Notebook-Searcher Background class: center middle bg-primary text-light Center list .
